data.client_settings: Release Channel: canary, Build Number: 19322, Version Hash: f271b728347df4ecf9f576003ff998f0e58c8226
data.actual_result: An uncaught exception "Failed to set the 'currentTime' property" causes Discord to crash.
data.expected_result: Since the audio file is 0:00 long, it should skip to the beginning.
data.steps_to_repro: - Download the following "smallest possible" wav file: github com/mathiasbynens/small/blob/master/wav wav- Send it to a Discord server, so that the sound embed shows up - Click anywhere on the seek bar (it should say 0:00 anywhere on the bar).
